channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Xcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Xcode

item.title: CVE-2023-40435|2024-08-02T18:31:53.796Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime. This issue is fixed in Xcode 15. An app may be able to access App Store credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-27967|2024-08-02T12:23:30.577Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in Xcode 14.3. An app may be able to execute arbitrary code out of its sandbox or with certain elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-23298|2024-06-04T17:45:45.091Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

item.title: CVE-2024-23298|2024-08-01T22:59:32.182Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.
